title: 3 and Out - Gruden Gate Reaction, Real Deal Cowboys, Baker Limitations, Defending Dan Campbell, Mailbag
itunes:title: 3 and Out - Gruden Gate Reaction, Real Deal Cowboys, Baker Limitations, Defending Dan Campbell, Mailbag
description:
John reacts to the end of the Jon Gruden era in Las Vegas following the release of more inappropriate emails and his theory about who was coming for his head. He also explains why these Cowboys are legit, why Chargers/Browns showed Baker's limitations, why he likes Dan Campbell's start in Detroit, why he's out on Oklahoma's Spencer Rattler, and answers listener questions in the Middlekauff Mailbag.

Make sure you follow John and The Volume on Twitter, Instagram and YouTube for the latest content and updates and check out FanDuel for the best wagering and daily fantasy action!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
